meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>steam</kanji> <kanji>flute</kanji> is a flute that goes off using steam. The only time I can think of this happening is via a <vocabulary>steam whistle</vocabulary>. Choo choooo!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
